content: In 1997, in a second match (the first one had occurred the year before), IBM supercomputer Deep Blue defeated Grand Master Garry Kasparov by 3.5 X 2.5.
translations: ita:Nel 1997, in una seconda partita (la prima si era verificata l'anno prima), il supercomputer IBM Deep Blue sconfisse il
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
